fields.task: Display basic system information using uname.
fields.hint: Use the uname command to display system information.

fields.task: List all files in the current directory.
fields.hint: Use the ls command to list files.

fields.task: Find the process ID of a running process.
fields.hint: Use the pidof command followed by the process name.

fields.task: Change directory to the home directory.
fields.hint: Use cd ~ or cd $HOME to go to the home directory.

fields.task: Check the permissions of a file named 'example.txt'.
fields.hint: Use ls -l to view file permissions.

fields.task: Display the IP address of the system.
fields.hint: Use ip addr or ifconfig to display network interfaces.
